output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
df <- read_csv("logfiles/100_ticks_10_agents_sat_probinvite.csv",
               col_types = list(
                 agent_1 = "f",
                 agent_2 = "f",
                 tick_no = "i",
                 ticks_tog = "i"
               ))
head(df)
N <- length(unique(df$agent_1))
ticks <- max(df$tick_no)
```

```{r}
A <- 9
B <- 10
```


```{r}
df %>% filter(agent_1 == A & agent_2 == B | agent_1 == B & agent_2 == A) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = tick_no, y = sat, color = agent_1)) +
  geom_path()

df %>% filter(agent_1 == A & agent_2 == B | agent_1 == B & agent_2 == A) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = tick_no, y = commit, color = agent_1)) +
  geom_path()
```
